prefix_prompt: I want to write music captions that describe the temporal order of two instruments. Write this caption in three styles
inputs: Organ is played after Chromatic Percussion.
sufix_prompt: The answers need to be three sentences parsed with newlines. Do not number them. Do not add subjective information. Do not add any additional information than the temporal order.
captions:
Style 1: 
Organ follows Chromatic Percussion. 
Chromatic Percussion precedes Organ. 
Organ is played after Chromatic Percussion.

Style 2: 
Chromatic Percussion is first, then Organ. 
Organ is the second instrument. 
Organ follows Chromatic Percussion.

Style 3: 
Chromatic Percussion comes before Organ. 
Organ is the second instrument heard. 
Organ is played
